meanings.sent1: She started virilising her appearance by cutting her hair short.

meanings.definition: The process of developing male characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the virilising of the body during puberty.
meanings.sent2: His virilising was evident in his deep voice and muscular build.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show exaggerated the virilising of the characters for laughs.
